page.title: 07Torridon Mountain Rescue
page.content: The{Mountain Rescue}post is at the Youth Hostel,all the equipment is there including stretchers,ropes,axes, walkie-talkie CB ,special protective clothing and blankets.There are about 30 people in the mountain rescue team plus voluntary help from climbers in the Hostel.There are at least half a dozen rescues each year, most of them at{New Year}&{Easter}.These occur on {Ben Eighe,Liathach & Ben Alligin},the steepest places on these mountains are where most falls happen;particular hazards are{The Pinnacles}.The R.A.F helecopter comes out only if weather is suitable.Police and Doctor attend. Most of the injuries are minor,broken ankle;some more serious,internal; some are fatal.Conditions in weather can change very quickly and differ at 3,000ft from at sea level.Inexperience & poor equipment also cause accidents.
